sentences: Espen Ronneberg, Secretariat of the Pacific Regional Environment Programme (SPREP), in his presentation on the Pacific Adaptation to Climate Change project (PACC), described PACC s goal of increasing resilience and enhancing adaptive capacity of coastal communities and infrastructure.
He said that PACC has three focal areas: water resource management; coastal management and infrastructure; and food production and food security.
He described the methodology of PACC using the example of project activities on Kosrae, an island in Micronesia.
Ronneberg also noted that the Pacific Islands are in the process of finalizing an action plan under the Pacific Islands Framework for Action on Climate Change.
enb_long_title: UNFCCC Expert Group Meeting on socioeconomic information under the Nairobi Work Programme on Impacts, Vulnerability and Adaptation to Climate Change (NWP)
